txt.en: A fishing rack stands in front of the house in the northern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should examine the fishing rack.
The Fishermen: Unaware of the Threat
The fish on this rack are fresh-caught. Perhaps the fishermen are nearby, catching more fish....

'Come to think of it, there are other residents of the Whitshaws who have not been warned of Núrzum's presence. If Gárwig wishes everyone to evacuate to Forlaw, it would be good of you to let them know.

'The fishermen live in a lonely house in the northern plains, at the edge of lake and wood. They are not friendly, but they trade us fish and game every so often. While I do not like them, I do not wish them to be eaten by a giant!'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest must be completed before the refugees leave the Whitshaws.</rgb>
Gifemund spoke of two fishermen who live in a house in the Northern Whitshaws, near the edge of the lake and the woods.\n\nYou should search for the fishermen's home.
Gifemund spoke of two fishermen who often sold goods to the people of Dunfast who are not yet aware of the threat of Núrzum.
